content.json: # Security Operations Efficiency

parameters.name: InternalWSs
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| take 1
| parse IncidentUrl with * "/workspaces/" Workspace "/" *
| project Workspace

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
Resources
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = subscriptionId, label = subscriptionId, selected = Rank == 1

parameters.name: Workspace
Severity
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize Count = count(IncidentNumber) by Severity
| project Value = Severity, Label = strcat(Severity, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Tactics
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| mvexpand Tactics to typeof(string)
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Tactics
| project Value = Tactics, Label = strcat(Tactics, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend owner = tostring(Owner.assignedTo) 
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Owner= case(owner=="", "Unassigned",owner)
| project Value = Owner, Label = strcat(Owner, ": ", Count)

parameters.name: Product
parameters.label: Product Name
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Product = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0]) 
| summarize Count=count(IncidentNumber) by Product
| project Value = Product, Label = strcat(Product, ": ", Count)

content.json: ## Incidents created over time
## Incidents by closing classification

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData,CreatedTime) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize count() by bin(CreatedTime, 1h)

SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeBrush:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeBrush:end}
| where Status == 'Closed'
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| extend feedback =strcat(Classification," ",ClassificationReason)
| summarize dcount(IncidentNumber) by feedback

SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize dcount(IncidentNumber) by Severity
content.title: Incidents created by severity

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize count() by case(tostring(Owner)=="", "Unassigned",tostring(Owner))
content.title: Incidents created by owner

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData) by IncidentNumber
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize count() by Status
content.title: Incidents created by status

content.json: Time to triage, is the time between the incident creation and its first update.
Time to closure, is the time between the incident creation and its last closure.

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where FirstModifiedTime  >= {TimeRange:start} and FirstModifiedTime  <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize arg_max(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToTriage =  (FirstModifiedTime - CreatedTime)/1h
| summarize AvgTTT=avg(TimeToTriage)
content.title: Mean time to triage

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where ClosedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and ClosedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToClosure =  (ClosedTime - CreatedTime)/1h
| summarize AvgTTC=avg(TimeToClosure)
content.title: Mean time to closure

content.json: ## Incidents created by severity over time

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize Incidents=dcount(IncidentNumber) by Severity, bin(CreatedTime, 1d)

content.json: ## Incidents created by owner over time

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize Incidents=dcount(IncidentNumber) by case(tostring(Owner)=="", "Unassigned",tostring(Owner)), bin(CreatedTime, 1d)

content.json: ## Incidents created by status over time

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize Incidents=dcount(IncidentNumber) by Status, bin(CreatedTime, 1d)

content.json: ## Incidents created by product over time

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize Incidents=dcount(IncidentNumber) by tostring(Product), bin(CreatedTime, 1d)

content.json: ## Incidents created by tactics over time

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| mvexpand Tactics to typeof(string)
| summarize Incidents=dcount(IncidentNumber) by Tactics, bin(CreatedTime, 1d)

content.json: ## Incidents created by tags over time

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| extend Tags = extract_all('labelName":"(.*?)"',tostring(Labels))
| mvexpand Tags to typeof(string)
| summarize Incidents=dcount(IncidentNumber) by Tags, bin(CreatedTime, 1d)

content.json: ## Incidents created by name

content.query:
SecurityIncident 
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData,CreatedTime) by IncidentNumber, Title
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize count() by bin(CreatedTime, 1h), Title
| order by count_ desc

items.name: Incidents tactic over time - Copy - Copy

content.json: ## Time to triage (percentiles)
Time to triage, is the time between the incident creation and its first update.

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where FirstModifiedTime  >= {TimeRange:start} and FirstModifiedTime  <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize arg_max(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToTriage =  (FirstModifiedTime - CreatedTime)/1h
| summarize 5th_Percentile=max_of(percentile(TimeToTriage, 5),0),50th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToTriage, 50), 90th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToTriage, 90),99th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToTriage, 99) by bin(FirstModifiedTime, 1d)

content.json: ## Time to closure (percentiles)
Time to closure, is the time between the incident creation and its last closure.

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where ClosedTime  >= {TimeRange:start} and ClosedTime  <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize arg_max(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToClosure =  (ClosedTime - CreatedTime)/1h
| summarize 5th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToClosure, 5),50th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToClosure, 50), 90th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToClosure, 90),99th_Percentile=percentile(TimeToClosure, 99) by bin(ClosedTime, 1d)

content.json: ## Mean time to closure per owner
The mean time between the incident creation and last closure by owner

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeBrush:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeBrush:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
|where Status == 'Closed'  
| extend Ownerr = case(tostring(Owner)=="", "Unassigned",tostring(Owner))
| summarize arg_min(LastModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber, Owner = Ownerr
| extend TimeToTriage = LastModifiedTime - CreatedTime, Owner
| summarize avg(TimeToTriage/1h) by Owner

content.json: ## Mean time to triage per owner
The mean time between the incident creation and first modification by owner

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeRange:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeRange:end}
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize arg_max(FirstModifiedTime,*) by IncidentNumber 
| extend TimeToTriage =  FirstModifiedTime - CreatedTime
| extend MinToTriage = TimeToTriage/1h
| summarize avg(TimeToTriage/1h) by owner=case(tostring(Owner)=="", "Unassigned",tostring(Owner))

content.json: ## Actions per user
The number of actions taken on incidents per incident modifier

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime >= {TimeBrush:start} and CreatedTime <= {TimeBrush:end}
| where ModifiedBy !in("Alert Grouping","Fusion","Incident created from alert")
| where ModifiedBy !contains("Automation rule")
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| summarize count() by ModifiedBy

content.json: ## Recent activities
Most recent activities taken on incidents

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| order by LastModifiedTime 
| project LastModifiedTime,IncidentNumber, Title, Product, IncidentUrl, ModifiedBy,Status, Severity, Owner
| take 250

content.json: ## Recent incident closing classification
Recent closing classifications and comments of incidents

items.name: Help3 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where Severity in ({Severity}) or "*" in ({Severity})
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Tactics in ({Tactics}) or "*" in ({Tactics})
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo) 
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or "*" in ({Owner})
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| where Product in ({Product}) or "*" in ({Product})
| where Status == 'Closed'
| order by LastModifiedTime 
| project LastModifiedTime,IncidentNumber, Title, Classification, ClassificationReason,ClassificationComment, Product, IncidentUrl, ModifiedBy,Status, Severity,Owner
| take 250
